mapper.select: SELECT department_key as departmentKey, department_name as departmentName FROM department
SELECT id, department_key as departmentKey, department_name as departmentName, principal FROM department WHERE department_name LIKE "%"#{departmentName}"%"
SELECT department_key as departmentKey, department_name as departmentName, principal FROM department WHERE department_name = #{departmentName}
SELECT dep.id, dep.department_key as departmentKey, dep.department_name as departmentName, ui.nickname AS principal FROM `department` AS dep LEFT JOIN user_info AS ui ON dep.principal = ui.id
